testcase.name: OrangeHRM Functionality Scenario
testcase.system-out: Given user is available on Login Page Of OrangeHRM..........................passed Then user enters username from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user enters password from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed Then user clicks on Login Button............................................passed And user verifies login verification from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed When user navigates to PIM Module...........................................passed Then user clicks on AddEmployee Option......................................passed And user enters firstname from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user enters lastname from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user enters filepath for photograph from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed Then user clicks on save button.............................................passed And user clicks on Employee List............................................passed Then user enters employee name from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user enters employee id from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user clicks on search Button............................................passed When user navigates to Admin Module.........................................passed Then user clicks on UserManagement Option...................................passed And user clicks on Add Button...............................................passed Then user enters employee name for admin from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user enters username for admin from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user enters password for admin from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user enters confirm password from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed Then user clicks on save button for admin...................................passed Then user enters system Username from given sheetname as "Sheet1" and rownumber "0".passed And user clicks on search button for admin..................................passed
